Week
Lvl.
in the
Lvl. 1
Lvl. 3
Lvl. 5
Lvl. 6
met their final fate during the quest.
joined each other in a heroic demise. There were no survivors.
set forth to explore the Ruins.
set forth to explore the Weald.
set forth to explore the Warrens.
embarked to slay evil in the Ruins.
embarked to slay evil in the Weald.
embarked to slay evil in the Warrens.
set forth to purge our ancestral Ruins of the Necromancer.
embarked to the Weald, determined to hunt and slay a foul cannibalistic Hag.
delved deep into the Warrens, bent on destruction of the gargantuan Swine Prince.
set off to reclaim Holy Relics buried deep in the ruined vaults of the ancestral home.
embarked in search of vital medicines lost along the Old Road in the Weald.
went to recover foodstuffs that the Swine have stolen and stashed in the Warrens.
went on a mission of reclamation in the Ruins, to restore holy altars in the name of Light.
set off on a mission to stave off growing disease in the Weald.
embarked to settle a score with the Swine, tearing down their shrines in the Warrens.
were successful in exploring the Ruins.
returned from successfully scouting the Weald.
delved into the Warrens and returned successfully.
vanquished many monsters in the Ruins.
successfully brought the battle to the Weald and returned.
left many a Swine slain in the bloody Warrens.
disposed of the terrible Necromancer!
put a stop to the cannibalistic ways of the evil Hag!
sent the Swine Prince back into the hells from which it came!
returned from the Ruins with the Holy Relics!
returned from the Weald with the lost medicines!
returned from the Warrens with the stolen grain!
succesfully restored Holy Altars in the Ruins back to the way of Light.
purified the diseased corpses strewn about the Weald.
tore down the Swine's shrines in the Warrens.
could not finish exploring the Ruins.
could not finish exploring the Weald.
could not finish exploring the Warrens.
had to flee the unholy abominations in the Ruins.
did not measure up to the fierce creatures arrayed against them in the Weald.
retreated from the might of the Swine in the Warrens.
were unable to stop the Necromancer.
were unable to stop the Hag.
were unable to stop the Swine Prince.
did not locate the lost relics in the Ruins.
did not locate the missing medicines in the Weald.
did not locate the stolen foodstuffs in the Warrens.
could not restore the Holy Altars in the Ruins.
could not find and purify the corpses in the Weald.
could not tear down the Swine shrines in the Warrens.

upgraded to

successfully escorted you to the Hamlet.
perished on the Old Road, but you escaped through the trees and made it to the Hamlet.
successfully escorted you to the Hamlet, but
met his end on the Old Road.
